CustomField.description: IF Planned delivery date = Actual delivery date THEN Delivery On Time IF Modified Delivery date = Actual delivery date AND Reason for Postponement = Postponed by Customer THEN Delivery On Time IF Planned delivery date â‰ Actual delivery date THEN Delivery IS NOT On Time IF Postponed Delivery date = Actual delivery date AND Reason for Postponement = Postponed by Telia THEN Delivery IS NOT On Time
CustomField.formula: IF( Planned_delivery_date__c = Actual_Delivery_date__c ,TRUE, IF( (Modified_Delivery_Date__c = Actual_Delivery_date__c) && ISPICKVAL( Reason_for_modification__c , "Modified by customer"),TRUE, IF( Planned_delivery_date__c <> Actual_Delivery_date__c ,FALSE, IF( (Modified_Delivery_Date__c = Actual_Delivery_date__c) && ISPICKVAL( Reason_for_modification__c , "Modified by Norlys"),FALSE, FALSE))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Checked by the system if the delivery was on time
CustomField.label: On Time Delivery
